mapper.select: SELECT r1.*, a1.username as username, a2.username as reply_username, r2.content as reply_content, r2.created_at as reply_time FROM m_reply as r1 LEFT JOIN m_account as a1 ON (r1.account_id = a1.id) LEFT JOIN m_reply as r2 ON (r1.reply_id = r2.id) LEFT JOIN m_account as a2 ON (r2.account_id = a2.id) WHERE r1.post_id = #{post_id} LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};
